name: vue-airbnb-style-datepicker
description: A VueJs version of the popular AirBnb datepicker

scripts.build: rimraf dist/ && npm run build-main && npm run build-no-dep
scripts.build-no-dep: bili --outDir dist/no-dep --format umd,umd-min --plugin vue --vue.css dist/styles.css --no-inline --global.date-fns/format dateFns.format --global.date-fns/add_months dateFns.addMonths --global.date-fns/sub_months dateFns.subMonths --global.date-fns/get_days_in_month dateFns.getDaysInMonth --global.date-fns/is_before dateFns.isBefore --global.date-fns/is_after dateFns.isAfter

author: MikaelEdebro <mikael.edebro@gmail.com>
